b:widget.title: Gün bir kez otomatik olarak ping atar

b:widget-settings.b:widget-setting:
<script>const pingUrls={google:"https://www.google.com/ping?sitemap=",yandex:"https://webmaster.yandex.com/site/map.xml?host=",bing:"https://www.bing.com/webmaster/ping.aspx?siteMap="};const sitemapUrl="https://www.1ad.com.tr/sitemap.xml";async function sendPing(engine,url){try{const response=await fetch(url+encodeURIComponent(sitemapUrl));if(response.ok){console.log(`Ping to ${engine}successful.`);}else{console.log(`Ping to ${engine}failed with status code:${response.status}.`);}}catch(error){console.log(`Ping to ${engine}failed with error:${error.message}`);}}
function pingAll(){for(const[engine,url]of Object.entries(pingUrls)){sendPing(engine,url);}}
setInterval(()=>{console.log("Pinging search engines...");pingAll();},24*60*60*1000);console.log("Pinging search engines...");pingAll();</script>
